document.masterDocTitle: Catalog of the vespid wasps of Iran (Hymenoptera, Vespidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalog of the vespid wasps of Iran (Hymenoptera, Vespidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined: Zanjan: Daram,
25 .VIII. 2005
, Zanjan,
16 .VII. 2006
, leg. R. Abbasi.

Remarks: This species was previously reported as
E. crimensis
from Iran by Abassi et al . ( 2006 ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 31–34. Characters of Eumeninae . 31,
Pterocheilus chobauti Dusmet
, female head in frontal view. 32–34, head in lateral view. 32,
Symmorphus murarius (Linnaeus)
. 33,
Ancistrocerus auctus (Fabricius)
. 34,
Paravespa quadricolor (Morawitz)
. Scale bars = 1 mm.

FIGURES 35–40. Characters of Eumeninae . 35–36, head in frontal view. 35,
Katamenes flavigularis (Blüthgen)
. 36,
Delta hottentottum
(de Saussure). 37,
Onychopterocheilus unipunctatus (Lepeletier)
, head and labial palpus in lateral view. 38,
Gymnomerus laevipes (Shuckard)
, head in dorsal view. 39,
Hemipterochilus moricei
(von Schulthess), head and labial palpus in lateral view. 40,
Odynerus melanocephaus armeniacus (Morawitz)
, head in dorsal view. Scale bars = 1 mm.

FIGURES 41–44. Characters of Eumeninae . Forewing. 41,
Raphiglossa eumenoides Saunders.
42,
Discoelius dufourii Lepeletier.
43,
Paravespa quadricolor (Morawitz)
. 44,
Cephalochilus draco Giordani Soika. Scale
bars = 1 mm.

Remarks: The subspecies
Eumenes dubius palaestinensis Blüthgen, 1938
, is also known from Iran .

Material examined: Azarbāijān-e Sharghi: Hashtrud: Aghbolagh, 1700m .,
26 /VII/ 2003
; Ahmadabad, 1900m .,
15 /VII/ 2003
; Miāneh: Kāghazkahān-Yānbolāgh, 2500m .,
26 .VI. 2003

5 .VI. 2003
; leg. Abbāsi; Kordestān: Marivān: Pāygelān, 1320m .,
VII. 2002
, leg. Soleymāni.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 45–48. Characters of Eumeninae . 45–47, forewing. 45,
Psiliglossa algeriensis Saunders.
46,
Gymnomerus laevipes (Shuckard)
. 47,
Alastor atropos Lepeletier.
48,
Discoelius dufourii Lepeletier
, midleg. Scale bars = 1 mm.

FIGURES 49–50. Characters of Eumeninae . Propodeal vavlula. 49,
Tachyancistrocerus schmidti (Kokujev)
. 50,
Ancistrocerus auctus (Fabricius)
. Scale bars = 1 mm.

Remarks: The subspecies
Eumenes mediterraneus quettaensis Cameron
is also known from Iran .

Material examined: Azarbāijān-e Sharghi: Hashtrud: Tāzehkand, 1250m .,
1 .VII. 2003
, leg. Abbāsi.

Material examined: Markazi: Farmahin: 1750m .,
18 .IX. 2002
; Tafresh- Rudbar-Gharejāghieh, 1450m .,
19 .VI. 2002
, leg. Sobhāni.
Remarks: This species is a new record for Iran .

The following species have been recorded from Iran , but were not collected:
Eumenes coronatus detonsus Blüthgen
,
E. interpositus Gusenleitner
,
E. modestus Gusenleitner
and
E. sareptanus scabrosus Gusenleitner.
